entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a wizard who is being polite and trying to comfort the elf Dobby. ("Sit down," said Harry politely, pointing at the bed.)

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: An elf who is offended by Harry's actions and is emotional about it. (‘Offend Dobby!’ choked the elf.)

relationships.description: Harry tries to comfort Dobby after he bursts into tears. (Harry, trying to say ‘Shh!’ and look comforting at the same time, ushered Dobby back onto the bed where he sat hiccoughing...)
